title: Knowledge and Defense
text: While this objective is undamaged, you may return friendly units destroyed during an engagement to their owner's hand instead of discarding them.

title: Daughters of Allya
text: Reaction: After you commit this unit to the Force, remove 1 damage from each objective you control.

title: Daughters of Allya
text: Reaction: After you commit this unit to the Force, remove 1 damage from each objective you control.

title: Yoda's Protection
text:
Enhance an objective.
Reaction: After an engagement is declared against enhanced objective, place 1 shield on it.

title: Confronting the Terror
text: Interrupt: When damage is dealt to a friendly unit or objective, your opponent must instead divide that damage among any number of units and objectives he controls.

title: Protection
text: Place 1 shield on a target unit or objective.

title: Last Defense of Hoth
text: While this objective is undamaged, it gains: "Interrupt: When you would place a card into an edge stack, you may instead look at the top card of your deck and place it facedown in your edge stack. (Limit once per edge battle.)"

title: Col Serra
text:
Edge (1). (While this unit is participating in an engagement, add 1 Force icon to your side during edge battles.)
During an engagement in which you have the edge, this unit cannot be damaged or have focus tokens placed on it by enemy card effects or combat icons.

keywords.text: While this unit is participating in an engagement, add 1 Force icon to your side during edge battles.

title: Renegade Squadron X-Wing
text: Action: Sacrifice this unit to return a target unit with printed cost 2 or lower to its owner's hand.

title: A Stinging Insult
text: Reaction: After you declare a [Smugglers and Spies] Character unit as an attacker, target an enemy unit. That unit must defend this engagement, if able.

title: Don't Get Cocky
text: Reaction: After you win an edge battle by 2 or more Force icons, a target participating unit gains [Blast Damage] [Blast Damage] until the end of the engagement.

title: Frozen Refuge
text: Limit 1 per objective deck.

title: WED-15-1016
text: Reaction: After you refresh, remove 1 token (any type) from a target Hoth objective.

title: FX-7 Medical Assistant
text: Reaction: After this unit is focused to strike, remove 1 token (any type) from a target enhancement or Character unit.

title: Echo Control Center
text:
Enhance your play area.
Enemy events cannot target other friendly enhancements.

title: Battle of Hoth
text: You may deal 1 damage to or remove 1 damage from a target Hoth objective.

title: The General's Imperative
text: While this objective is undamaged, your reserve value is increased by 1.

title: General Veers
text: Each Walker and each Trooper unit you control gains [Unit Damage].

title: Blizzard Force AT-ST
text: Shielding. (When this unit enters an engagement, place 1 shield on any unit or objective in the engagement.)

keywords.text: When this unit enters an engagement, place 1 shield on any unit or objective in the engagement.

title: Blizzard Force AT-ST
text: Shielding. (When this unit enters an engagement, place 1 shield on any unit or objective in the engagement.)

keywords.text: When this unit enters an engagement, place 1 shield on any unit or objective in the engagement.

title: Turbolaser Battery
text:
Enhance your play area.
Reaction: After an enemy objective is destroyed, sacrifice this enhancement to discard all enhancements from play.

title: Battle of Hoth
text: You may deal 1 damage or remove 1 damage from a target Hoth objective.

title: Lucrative Contract
text:
Scum and Villainy affiliation only.
Reaction: After you refresh, remove 1 focus token from a target Mercenary or Bounty Hunter unit.

title: Corrupt Official
text: Interrupt: When a [Scum and Villainy] objective would be damaged, discard this unit from your hand to cancel any amount of that damage.

title: Corrupt Official
text: Interrupt: When a [Scum and Villainy] objective would be damaged, discard this unit from your hand to cancel any amount of that damage.

title: Explosive Charge
text: Action: Discard a target enhancement with a printed cost equal to or lower than the number of enhancements you control.

title: Twist of Fate
text: Cancel this edge battle and the card effects of all other fate cards just revealed. Discard both edge stacks and start a new edge battle.

title: Sabotage in the Snow
text:
Limit 1 per objective deck.
Reaction: After your conflict phase begins, move 1 shield from a target enemy card to a target friendly card.

title: Snowtrooper Vanguard
text: Shielding. (When this unit enters an engagement, place 1 shield on any unit or objective in the engagement.)

keywords.text: When this unit enters an engagement, place 1 shield on any unit or objective in the engagement.

title: Forward Command Post
text:
Enhance your play area.
Each friendly shielded unit gains [Blast Damage].

text:
Enhance your play area.
Each friendly shielded unit gains [Blast Damage].

title: Battle of Hoth
text: You may deal 1 damage to or remove 1 damage from a target Hoth objective.
